title: <label>
description: The `<label>` HTML element provides a text label for form controls like `<input>`, `<textarea>` or `<select>`, enhancing accessibility by linking descriptive labels directly to these elements for clarity and usability.
content: The element that provides a label for an `<input>` element, improving accessibility by making forms easier to understand and navigate. Clicking the label focuses or activates the associated input control.
